name: Wizard's Harmony R
overview: Wizard's Harmony R doesn't tell the story of the Wizard Rufus, this time the main character is called Tians. Wizard's Harmony R is a simulation that takes place in a Magic Academy where you must master the arcane arts and socialize with members of the school. The game perspective views the world from an overhead, isometric position that affords ample coverage of the action on screen. The player can choose what their characters do each week, they can study, train different magic styles, be a better listener, rest, etc. Depending of the training the affinity of the members will be worse or better.
